name: hollis
text: Beef has a point.

name: jackparsons
text: It's only of such ferocity when no bone is on.

name: themacktruck
text: Beef has the point.  There is no scarier force on this green Earth.

name: rainwolfj
text: A comment left by rainwolfj was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Vondicus, Deusoma, dismas, Private_Public)

name: thedice
text:
You forgot the capital 'C'.
Circumstances, man, Circumstances .

name: abendsonnen
text: Let's also take a moment to appreciate his war goggles.

name: norsef
text: Beef speaks from experience. He's furious at the world.

name: abe
text: This arc has the best lines in the history of Achewood...  "Bloggin' the fight through a tube in your face..."  Take me home...

name: malesherbez
text:
barry has pit stains but no shirt

way gross

name: nathanielperson
text: I think that's hair.

name: luckypyjamas
text: i don't know, it looked like pit stains

name: wulvaine
text:
Pit tattoos.

Or, if you want a portmanteau, pittoos.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
that sounds like onomatopoeia for spitting

also pit tattoos = gross/painful

name: wulvaine
text: Yes, indeed. I would say 'ouch', but I'm afraid to open my mouth now.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: a clenched-teeth 'eeeeeeeeeesh' does well.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Pit tattoos, Pit TAHtoos - it doesn't really matter

name: ninfea
text: My feelings on your asset are PRO, my friend. Such a shame the trawlers in the archive are few and far between, because you seriously deserve hell of chubbies.

name: fineoakstructure
text: hey thanks man

name: splendorr
text: Agreed. A gentle twist on a old favorite, hidden among the trash and compulsive repeition of the word "circumstances" like an Aladdin in the desert.

name: undyingsong
text: It is hair.

name: shinkusan
text: Way gross

name: catachresis
text: Either we've got some speech-bubble mess-up here or Ted and Barry are fond of the old tough-guy "refer to yourself in the third person" routine

name: junko
text: They are old chums who refer to one another

name: cracker
text:
They point at each other in panel four.

They do not point at each other in panel five.

name: rogergs
text: The Great British Fight was traditionally held at 11:30 pm in Hull city centre ... every night.

name: soticoto
text: Except once where it had to be relocated to Milton Keynes. Bad year that.

name: aparrish
text: It's true; having a bleedin' hilarious blog entitles you to privileges that would otherwise be unavailable to you.

name: senseihollywood
text: such as getting your ass beat by 3000 dudes...

name: epicurus
text:
Well, 2999 dudes, anyway.

Unless you are having a really bad day.

name: jerkface
text: a comic consisting only of the last two panels would be 5. everything else is tasty side dishes.

name: rachel
text: A comment left by rachel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, dismas, GMM, thunderbat, catgrl131, Tagrineth, Semiquaver, Firehawk, gethen, godfatherofsouls, Lumus, foetus_punch, duperando, CEOKasen, Epicurus, scraggg, mattylite, stormagnet, Satyr)

name: norrin
text: He needed a reason for Ray to accept these guys. The "wry observation" bit was a side effect of a necessary line. Couldn't be helped.

name: rachel
text: it could have ended after the 6th panel

name: epicurus
text: With respect, you're nuts.

name: charchar
text: They do seem a sorry bunch: Ray was expecting bad-assery from all.  Beef is simply elucidating the reasons for the general low quality of players.

name: saint
text:
What's your beef with Jeph Jacques?
Only problem with him is that all his characters have the exact same personality.

name: duperando
text:
I don't usually lame things, but I felt that I had to lame this-- I apologize.
I personally feel that this is one of the wrongest statements I have seen on assetbar in regards to quotes and such.
That last line is what makes this strip bloody brilliant. That last line is what makes it for me.
Anyways, you are entitled to your opinion, but I had to defend the honor of one of my favorite RB quotes.

name: zedpower
text: I don't know what "gormy" means exactly, but I feel like I do.

name: fosters
text: I hate these two guys.

name: cherubrocker22
text: Not to nitpick, but I think the speech bubbles in Panel 5 are switched. Barry says "they let barry in cause his blog is....".

name: tellumo
text: Possibly. But note that in panel 4 they're pointing at each other, and in panel 5 they're not pointing at anyone, or maybe pointing at themselves.

name: tekende
text: But the implication is that Ted is British ("this is Ted's first go at the American fight"), but the speech bubble about Barry's blog is obviously spoken by a British person. Onstad point the balloons at the wrong characters in panel five.

name: tellumo
text: I always thought they were both British--doesn't that explain things about as well, or am I missing something here? I'll definitely agree that something seems slightly off about that panel, though.

name: tekende
text: They are both British, you are correct. I was mistaken when I made that post.

name: soticoto
text: At at least this time Onstad ain't takin the royal piss out of us.

name: direhaggis
text: Such hatred is more furious than a thousands thousand of such as furious ding-dongs.

name: milkpants
text: i love that beef is still wearing his goggles. it's science.

name: tripperday
text: Why is Beef still wearing the motorcycle goggles?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
too right, CRBK.

toooooooo right.

name: tripleg
text: i imagine them talking like tweedle-dee and tweedle-dum

name: twells
text: if dem boys were Brits they would have said "honor" with a "u"

name: ivanstrel
text:
"Through Sound and Motion, you will be able to paralyze nerves, shatter bones, set fires, suffocate an enemy or burst his organs."
-Dune (1984)

name: chezthemighty
text: I maintain that Beef's line in the end of this strip is the single best punchline in Achewood.
